PartyWelcomeMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <WHITE>Welcome! You are now in your own party. Use <GREEN>/party<WHITE> to manage your party.
PartyInviteReceivedMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <GREEN>{1}<WHITE> has invited you to their party. Type /party to accept.
PartyPlayerLeftNewHostMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <GREEN>{1}<WHITE> has left the party. <GREEN>{2}<WHITE> is now the host.
PartyPlayerKickedMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <GREEN>{1}<WHITE> has been kicked from the party.
PartyYouKickedMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <RED>You have been kicked from the party.
PingNoPartyMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <RED>You need to be in a party to use ping!
PingNoLocationMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <RED>No valid location found! Look at a block to ping it.
PartyChatNoPartyMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <RED>You need to be in a party to use party chat!
FriendsCannotSelfMessage: <RED>You cannot send a friend request to yourself.
FriendsAlreadyPendingMessage: <YELLOW>You already have a pending request to {1}.
FriendsRequestReceivedMessage: <CYAN>{1} sent you a friend request! Use /friends to view.
FriendsNoRequestMessage: <RED>No pending friend request from that player.
FriendsNoOutgoingRequestMessage: <RED>No pending friend request to that player.
FriendsNotFriendMessage: <RED>That player is not on your friends list.
FriendsRemovedMessage: <YELLOW>{1} has been removed from your friends list.
SimpleClaimsNeedPartyMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <RED>You need to create a SimpleClaims party first using /scparty create
SimpleClaimsNotOwnerMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <RED>Only the party owner can invite players.
SimpleClaimsInviteSentMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <WHITE>Invite sent to <GREEN>{1}<WHITE>. They can accept with /scparty accept
SimpleClaimsInviteReceivedMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <GREEN>{1}<WHITE> has invited you to their SimpleClaims party. Use /scparty accept to join.
SimpleClaimsYouRemovedMessage: <CYAN>[Party] <RED>You have been removed from the party.
